page.title: 06Children's Clubs, Evesham.
page.content: I belong to quite a lot of{clubs.}I go to{Brownies, choir}and after school on Wednesday I do{Gym Club at School.} At Brownies it's good, we work for badges I have got eight of them. The favourite things at Brownies I like are swimming and playing the games. At choir there is a Monday practice for all of us. I like going to the junior practice the best. We have wages twice a year; we have 1.5O the first time and the same money the second time. If we go to a wedding to sing we get 5Op; that's why I like going to them.{
